metadata.title: CVE-2023-2462 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Inappropriate implementation in Prompts in Google Chrome prior to113.0.5672.63 allowed a remote attacker to obfuscate main origin data via acrafted HTML page. (Chromium security severity: Medium)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
